document.masterDocTitle: Taxonomic review of the subgenus Andrena (Poecilandrena) (Hymenoptera: Andrenidae) in Israel and the Levant

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Andrena semirubra
Morawitz, 1876 : 57
. ♀. Type locality: Caucasus. Type depository: ZISP.

subSubSection.paragraph:
Distribution: Armenia , Azerbaijan , Crimea,
Georgia
, Israel , Russia , Syria , Turkey . Flight period: April–July.

Flower records: Asteraceae ; Brassicaceae ; Plantaginaceae :
Veronica
sp.; Rosaceae : Potentilla sp.
